subject: Greetings
body:
Greetings
I am Mr. Peter Ben, Kay Account Manager in well-known Bank, herein
London, England.
However, I have already sent you this same letter by post one month
ago, but I am not sure that the letter promptly gets to you since I
have not heard from you, now i am re-sending it again.
I discovered a dormant account in my office, as Group Accountant with
AhliUnited Bank (UK).
It will be in my interest to transfer this fund worth of Â£68.5M pounds
(Sixty Eight Million Five hundred thousand pounds) in an account
offshore.
Can you be my partner?
Regards and respect,
Mr. Peter Ben

subject: Re:   Greetings
body:
Hello Mr. Peter Ben,

I hope this message finds you well. Your letter certainly piqued my interest! It's not every day that one hears about a dormant account with such a substantial amount of money.

Could you please provide more details about this situation? How did you come across this account and why has it remained dormant? Also, what would be my role as your partner in this endeavor?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Ronald
